title: The Trouble with James
story: Hello, is this Mr. Smith? I'm Mrs. Jones. Hello, Mrs. Jones. Did you get my message? Yes, I did, I'm returning your call. Oh, right, of course. What's the problem? Is James in trouble? I caught him copying a classmate's test today. Oh, that child is incorrigible! I'm afraid I'll have to give him detention this time. It's alright, I understand. James certainly is strong-willed. Yes, he needs a firm hand and discipline! He's a good boy. Now if only he'd stop cheating!
summary: A concerned mother discusses her son's tendency to cheat and the need for discipline.
image: An image of a frustrated mother talking on the phone.
